name: Commemoration of Oscar II's 25th Wedding Anniversary
obverse: Heads of King Oscar II and Queen Sophia facing right.
obverse_inscriptions: OSCAR II SVERIGES OCH NORGES KONUNG·SOPHIA SVERIGES OCH NORGES DROTTNING.
reverse: A rough sea with ships sailing. In the middle is a warship sailing to the right. In the background is the Landsort lighthouse.
reverse_inscriptions: VID KONUNGAPARETS SILFVERBRÖLLOP AF DET FEMTIOÅRIGA SVENSKA SEGELSÄLLSKAPET
description: This medal was made to commemorate the 25th Wedding Anniversary between king Oscar II and Queen Sophia.
This medal was commissioned by the Swedish Sailing Company.
